item.title: What Bubble? Asset Managers in Risk-On Mode Stick With Stocks
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- There’s a time when investments run their course and the prudent move is to cash out. For global asset managers who’ve ridden double-digit gains in equities for three straight years, that time is not now. “Our expectation of solid growth and easier monetary and fiscal policies support...
